The video was published on Facebook on N: 2020, and the post's caption described it as showing the funeral procession of Congress politician Ahmed Patel who died of COVID-19.
Ahmed Patel: a prominent Indian National Congress party politician, died on November 25, 2020, after being diagnosed with COVID-19. His funeral took place on November 26, 2020, in Gujarat's Bharuch district.
A keyword search found a similar video p: 2020, by Indian media organization Hindustani Reporter, which showed the same casket as seen in the misleading posts.
